content: I'm trying (and failing) to write some version independent code to handle some work dealing with resources and references. One of my challenges is that it appears that the marker interfaces IBase, IBaseResource, and IBaseReference are defined in the dstu2.hl7.org and r4 packages, which means that they aren't really markers after all. Any thoughts on this?
FYI @Keith Boone - A little overdue, but the duplicate marker interfaces have all been cleared out now and every structure version now relies on the same interfaces and annotations.
